text: Ukraine war updates: China's Xi lays out 4 priorities to resolve Ukraine 'crisis'; Russia intensifies efforts to seize key town"🚨🇺🇦🇷🇺💥Newsflash! China's Xi has finally spoken up about the ongoing conflict in Ukraine. He has identified 4 key priorities to resolve the crisis: 1️⃣ Respect for sovereignty, 2️⃣ Territorial integrity, 3️⃣ Political settlement, and 4️⃣ Economic development. It's time for the world to come together and support a peaceful resolution in Ukraine! 🌎💪
